title: How to pair and set up your new Apple Watch Series 7
content:
The Apple Watch is a powerful wearable that is famous for its fitness and other non-health related features. When you buy an Apple Watch, you’re investing in a device that will simplify (and potentially even save) your life. The Series 7 is the latest and most advanced model sold by the company. The post How to pair and set up your new Apple Watch Series 7 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: This is a detailed, step-by-step guide on how to pair and set up your new Apple Watch Series 7. All you need is your iPhone and watch.
